lead_paragraph: Is productivity a method for freeing up more time to do what we want or a virtue to be pursued for its own sake?
snippet: Is productivity a method for freeing up more time to do what we want or a virtue to be pursued for its own sake?

abstract: Molly Young reviews books Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World by Cal Newport, Mindful Tech: How to Bring Balance to Our Digital Lives by David M Levy, The Productivity Project: Accomplishing More by Managing Your Time, Attention, and Energy by Chris Bailey and Pogue's Basics. Life: Essential Tips and Shortcuts (That No One Bothers to Tell You) by David Pogue.
